title: Active Inference ModelStream 007.2 ~ pymdp
description:
pymdp
Python package for simulating active inference agents
https://pymdp-rtd.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
pymdp: A Python library for active inference in discrete state spaces
https://arxiv.org/abs/2201.03904
Conor Heins & Daphne Demekas
